query:
query ($id: String!, $storeCodes: [String!], $lang: String) {
      productById(id: $id, storeCodes: $storeCodes, lang: $lang) {
        id
    title
    brand
    description
    size
    vendor
    size
    displayPrice
    originPrice
    priceUnit
    discountEndDate
    discountStartDate
    productType
    imageUrls
    seller
    sku
    skuCode
    status
    variants {
          id
      sku
      price
      storeCode
      outsideOfDeliveryZone
      metafields {
            value
        key
        __typename
      }
      compareAtPrice
      discountEndDate
      discountStartDate
      __typename
    }
    minVariantPrice
    maxVariantPrice
    totalInventory
    measurements {
          height
      length
      width
      dimensionUnit
      weight
      weightUnit
      __typename
    }
    sellerDetails {
          marketplaceType
      fulfilledByPlatform
      shopId
      shopName
      __typename
    }
    shippingInfo {
          deliveryTimeEarliestDate
      deliveryTimeLatestDate
      deliveryTimeEarliestDays
      deliveryTimeLatestDays
      shippingPrice
      zone
      __typename
    }
    collections {
          id
      handle
      title
      startDate
      endDate
      imageUrl
      type
      description
      __typename
    }
    badges {
          id
      name
      handle
      __typename
    }
    slabPrices {
          slabPriceDescription
      slabPriceTiers {
            discount
        priceInVat
        quantity
        tier
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    storageInformation
    expiryDays
    __typename
  }
}
